channel.title: Apocalypse World - Theater of Ashes
channel.description:
CONTENT WARNING: Violence, sex, possible player vs. player conflict.
DESCRIPTION: The world ended, but the show must go on. You are the Carnival of Ashes, you are the flames that burn their misery away, stoke their fantasies, and leave them drooling in desperation. Hardholders, harlots and even the hell bent biker gangs all travel to bask in your brilliance. This will be your greatest performance. Go, burn bright, burn your image into their retinas, and leave them begging for more.
SPECIAL REQUEST: Reserving the first 72 hours for new Gauntlet members and members of marginalized communities.
RSVP OPEN ACCESS TIME: Monday, February 8, 2021 - 8:00 AM PST NUMBER OF SESSIONS: 7 (Skipping a couple weeks due to holidays and birthdays). NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 4 + MC SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: CATS, Romance Consent, Roses and Thorns, Lines & Veils, X Card. The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct and the Open Door Policy will be in place (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html). All games should follow this.).** SET UP INFO: Will use Streamyard and send a reminder with links a week before the first session. BREAKS: 2 on the hour RECORDED: With permission granted before and after each session. PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
